name: 2D Top Down Shooter - Destroy The Planes (Infinite Mobile Game)
name_original: 2D Top Down Shooter - Destroy The Planes (Infinite Mobile Game)
description:
Controls:
Mobile friendly touch input.

A or D to steer left and right.

Use the right button to shoot.

Home button to go back, restart button for restart.

Destroy The Planes is a complete mobile friendly and fully ready-to-use unity project template with complete features such as player plane, enemy A.I, enemy and item generator, item pickups, score system, shooting and much more to create your own plane objective or arcade game. You can download the full game source here.
